content:
@Sadhana Alangar Please in your follow-up email to today's student visitors, include this link to the DevDays page I spoke about. It contains the links to learning FHIR from scratch.
https://www.devdays.com/amsterdam/student-track/

As I said, this page is about Amsterdam but the info is valuable on its own. If it's not already on a page on the HL7 Education subsite, perhaps it should be. :slight_smile:
It's under the heading "Learn FHIR through online tutorials"
